reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size with a perfect length and appreciate its design, with one noting it falls slightly above the waist with elastic.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty color, soft material, great detail and length
items.body: I love this dress! It's very soft material, great length. I ordered the medium, i'm 5'7", sits above my knees. It will look really good with my knee boots. The color is soft and pretty. I love the detail. Read more
items.author: JP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Great fit, good quality. Read more
items.author: best

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress
items.body: Super cute..a bit short but can work with leggings too.. well made Read more
items.author: Mary Ann C McCauley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Super comfy and can dress up or down. Love here with cute boots for wedding rehearsal even. Read more
items.author: Mother of six

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Came looking like a mess
items.body: Dress came so wrinkled and waded I don’t think I would ever get it out. Color is just like it shows - very pretty. Falls slightly above waist with elastic. Perfect length for shorter people Read more
items.author: MJR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dress.
items.body: Awesome dress! Great fit and I received compliments the first time I wore it. Great material. I will order other colors. Read more
items.author: Sondra Colbert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fully met expectations
items.body: I wasn’t sure the sizing was right or if it would arrive before I needed, but as usual, Amazon came through. Super warm and perfect length as well. Read more
items.author: Brittney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Fall Fashion!
items.body: Super cute, comfortable and lightweight - perfect for Fall! Read more
items.author: Lynnette J Valle

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lakeblue, Red, Wine, Navy, Pink, White, Yellow, Apricot, Black, Teal, Dustyblue, Armygreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
